attributes.action: Change exam dates that are in the time of Ramadan
attributes.additional_details: In the next couple of years, exams that take place in June will be in the time of Ramadan which makes it hard for students that are fasting to do well in their exams. So maybe if the government tries to change the dates of exams to the time where students are not fasting, i think it would be more fair and the students would probably do better then they would.
